name: Castles & Monsters
overview: The story: You are Sparlok, the warrior wizard. Mage of the 33rd degree to the counsil of the Morning Star, Royal astronomer to King Hegel Pemborg I and keeper of the magical staff of Pleaedes. Now the kingdom of Toëffelbard has been overrun by the forces of the dark light. It is your task to restore order to the realm and to vanquish the Nine of Wormwood. Along the way you will have to battle undead skeletons, black scorpions, witches and other nasties. There is also a dragon that bars your way to victory. You will also pass by the magic tree of the 'knowledge of that which you don't know you know' (Isilmivtenib) and the river of blood. Slog your way through the Castle complex and eventually good shall triumph... well maybe.
